name: MIN
description: Aggregate function that returns the minimum value in a column.

examples.title: Minimum value
examples.sql: SELECT MIN(price) as lowest_price FROM products

examples.title: Minimum date
examples.sql: SELECT MIN(created_at) as first_order FROM orders

examples.title: Minimum by group
examples.sql:
SELECT category, MIN(price) as min_price
FROM products
GROUP BY category

notes: Works with numeric, date, and string types
